title: vishvanAthA
sahitya:
vishvanAthA ennai ANDaruLvAi amzhaviDai vAhanA iraivA kAshi


anupallavi

  IshvarA ulaginil iru vinaip-payanAi jnAna-bhEda upAdigaL shUzhvadO


caraNam    unadaDi tudippavar manam oDindiDuvadO unadu tiruppeyar uraippavar keDuvadO
 annai viSAlAkSi anbuDan maruvum anAtha rakSaka aDimalar tuNaiyE
